statements: SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE scheduled_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE scheduled_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%urgent%' AND task_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'in-progress';
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_email FROM task_assignees;
SELECT task_id, assignee_name FROM task_assignees ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_status DESC, task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_name FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_assignees ON tasks.task_id = task_assignees.task_id WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT task_name, assignee_name, assignee_email FROM tasks INNER JOIN task_assignees ON tasks.task_id = task_assignees.task_id ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM Task;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM Task WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT scheduler_name, scheduler_status FROM TaskScheduler WHERE scheduler_status = 'Active' ORDER BY scheduler_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Task WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM Task INNER JOIN TaskLog ON Task.task_id = TaskLog.task_id WHERE Task.task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Task ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Task WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT task_name, scheduler_name, log_message FROM Task INNER JOIN TaskScheduler ON Task.task_id = TaskScheduler.task_id INNER JOIN TaskLog ON Task.task_id = TaskLog.task_id;

SELECT task_name, scheduler_name, log_timestamp FROM Task INNER JOIN TaskScheduler ON Task.task_id = TaskScheduler.task_id INNER JOIN TaskLog ON Task.task_id = TaskLog.task_id WHERE Task.task_status = 'pending';
SELECT DISTINCT task_name, task_description, scheduler_status FROM Task INNER JOIN TaskScheduler ON Task.task_id = TaskScheduler.task_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, scheduled_time FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE scheduled_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM task_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT task_name, assignee_name FROM tasks JOIN task_assignees ON tasks.task_id = task_assignees.task_id WHERE task_assignees.assigned_timestamp > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY task_assignees.assigned_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, scheduled_time FROM tasks WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description, status FROM tasks WHERE scheduled_time < NOW() ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT t.task_name, tl.log_message, tl.timestamp FROM tasks t JOIN task_logs tl ON t.task_id = tl.task_id WHERE tl.timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY tl.timestamp;
SELECT ta.task_id, ta.assignee_name, ta.assigned_timestamp, td.dependent_task_id FROM task_assignees ta JOIN task_dependencies td ON ta.task_id = td.task_id ORDER BY ta.assigned_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name, created_at FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'pending' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'John%' AND created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY users.created_at DESC

SELECT tasks.task_name, users.username FROM task_assignments INNER JOIN tasks ON task_assignments.task_id = tasks.task_id INNER JOIN users ON task_assignments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'pending' AND users.username = 'Alice'

SELECT tasks.task_name, users.username, task_assignments.completed_at FROM task_assignments INNER JOIN tasks ON task_assignments.task_id = tasks.task_id INNER JOIN users ON task_assignments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE completed_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY completed_at ASC LIMIT 10
